019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import com.google.gson.JsonElement;
023import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
024import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.Configuration;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ListMeta;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Objects;
030
031/**
032 * Represents a list of Kubernetes objects states.
033 */
034public class K8sObjectStates implements KubernetesListObject {
035
036    private final JsonObject data;
037    private final V1ListMeta metadata;
038    private final List<K8sObjectState> items;
039
040    /**
041     * Initialize the object states using the given JSON data.
042     *
043     * @param delegate the delegate
044     * @param data the data
045     */
046    public K8sObjectStates(Gson delegate, JsonObject data) {
047        this.data = data;
048        metadata = delegate.fromJson(data.get("metadata"), V1ListMeta.class);
049        items = new ArrayList<>();
050        for (JsonElement e : data.get("items").getAsJsonArray()) {
051            items.add(new K8sObjectState(delegate, e.getAsJsonObject()));
052        }
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Returns the JSON representation of this object.
057     *
058     * @return the json object
059     */
060    public JsonObject data() {
061        return data;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public V1ListMeta getMetadata() {
066        return metadata;
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public String getApiVersion() {
071        return this.data.get("apiVersion").getAsString();
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public String getKind() {
076        return this.data.get("kind").getAsString();
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public List<K8sObjectState> getItems() {
081        return items;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Sets the api version.
086     *
087     * @param apiVersion the new api version
088     */
089    public void setApiVersion(String apiVersion) {
090        this.data.addProperty("apiVersion", apiVersion);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Sets the kind.
095     *
096     * @param kind the new kind
097     */
098    public void setKind(String kind) {
099        this.data.addProperty("kind", kind);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Sets the metadata.
104     *
105     * @param objectMeta the new metadata
106     */
107    public void setMetadata(V1ListMeta objectMeta) {
108        this.data.add("metadata",
109            Configuration.getDefaultApiClient().getJSON().getGson()
110                .toJsonTree(objectMeta));
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public int hashCode() {
115        return Objects.hash(data);
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
120        if (this == obj) {
121            return true;
122        }
123        if (obj == null) {
124            return false;
125        }
126        if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
127            return false;
128        }
129        K8sObjectStates other = (K8sObjectStates) obj;
130        return Objects.equals(data, other.data);
131    }
132}
